page.title: 05LOCAL LANDOWNERS
page.content: Most of the farms in our block are dairy farms which grow crops and pasture for the animal feed.Some also have sheep,pigs or beef cattle.One farm specialises in egg production and at another they buy in horses to train them for hunting and competition work, before selling them.The farmers rear their own cattle, but pigs and poultry are bought in.Milk production goes to B'ham Cooperative Society.The animals are sold at Cheltenham and Kidderminster Markets. Most of the farms have been managed by the same family for generations and the farmers hope this will continue. The Wythall Young Farmers Club is very active in its concern for the environment.{Silvermead}
